1. To turn off the services just uncheck the Activate option 
2. Check the Block Calls to block all calls that are in the list 
3. Check the White List to only get calls from the White list 
4. Check the Block All Unknown Calls to block all calls that are not in phone book 
5. Check the Block SMS to block all SMS from the Black List Numbers 
6. Inorder to block SMS please enter your contry without "+" eg 92 
7. To only block SMS from the black list and want to receive call, just check the Block SMS;similarly to block calls and want to get SMS just check the Block Calls and leave Block Check unchecked 
8. Didn't find the answer you looking for? Please, do email me. 
9. AutoSMS send SMS to caller not in the White List, when White List is activated

I have started this application as a simple semester project. But now I want to make this app as good as possible. If you want to see any feature in this application, please dont hesistate to contact me on my email. I will add those features. If you like this application please Rate it.
